title: MAG 139 - Chosen Transcript
text:
is 
a mistake. And that just leaves Martin, which... 
Why were we chosen? Agnes was created, crafted with a specific purpose, so 
finely tuned that even a grain of uncertainty threatened the entirety of her 
being, but I’m so full of doubt it feels like there’s no room for anything else, 
and I’m sure Martin is the same. Is there destiny here? Bloodlines and 
prophecies? Or, or did we just… stumble into this? Maybe we’re the opposite 
of Agnes. Maybe our doubts are exactly what we need. If, if that’s the case, I’m 
a… an amazing chosen one! 
Dunno how that would work though. I’m just worried about Martin. Christ, 
every other avatar gets to have their feelings burned right out of them, but 

The Magnus Archives – 139 – Chosen 
11 
 
me? I’ve just got to sit in mine. I know he said he had everything under control. 
I need to trust him, whatever he’s doing with Peter he’s— 
He knows what he’s doing. Probably. I just— I need him to be okay. I just do. 
If I Knew… what his plan was. If I Knew what Peter was doing. If I just… 
(Softly) Can I? 
(Grunts of exertion as he tries to know) 
[Static rises] 
(The Archivist cries out in pain) 
[Static fades] 
ARCHIVIST (Cont.) 
(Pained) End… End recording. 
[The tape clicks off.]

Today’s episode was written by Jonathan Sims and directed by Alexander J 
Newall. 
It featured: Jonathan Sims as the Archivist.
